snippet: Mike Huckabee’s longtime nemesis, the anti-tax group Club for Growth, is greeting his entry into the 2016 Republican presidential primary with a $100,000 ad buy denouncing his record.
abstract: Mike Huckabee’s longtime nemesis, the anti-tax group Club for Growth, is greeting his entry into the 2016 Republican presidential primary with a $100,000 ad buy denouncing his record.

headline.main: Anti-Tax Group Wastes No Time Targeting Mike Huckabee
